entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low zero.
